entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mingan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Longue-Pointe-de-Mingan 04:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -36.3°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
